availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Jacobs. Father of George W. Jacobs, Charles L. Jacobs, James W. Jacobs, and Robert W. Jacobs. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 252.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 4, p. 546B.
Find A Grave, "Ira Jacobs (1827-1898)," Memorial #66584149, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66584149 (accessed January 17, 2020).
